name: Sliding Wooden Block Puzzle
description:
Sliding Block Puzzle is a fantasying game, the game’s target is move all the tiles into sequence as less as steps, as soon as possible. We well designed 9 different levels, and levels are becoming more and more difficulty.

Game feature:
- different difficulty mode, from 3x3 to 11x11
- smoothly sliding wood block
- wooden style
- rank with other players
